title: Consolidation Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005), with the consent of the Minister for
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Child Benefit)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Child Benefit) 

(Temporary Provisions) Regulations 2023. 

Temporary variation of rate of child benefit
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited social welfare (child benefit) (temporary provisions) regulation 2023 temporary variation rate child benefit

title: Consolidation Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005), with the consent of the Minister for
heading: 2. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to child
text_raw:
2. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to child 

benefit. 

(2) In the case of a person to whom this article applies, the child benefit 
payment payable to that person in respect of the month of December 2023 shall 
be increased by 100%. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 November, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 November, 2023. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [572] 3

title: Consolidation Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005), with the consent of the Minister for
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for a double payment bonus to recipients of child 
benefit in December 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [572]
